room_title: Escape room "Chamber of Hocus" by Novus Escape Room in West Palm Beach
room_address: 458 N Federal Hwy Boynton Beach, FL 33435
room_description: Mr. Hocus, a notorious criminal who dabbles in the art of magic and uses it in his crimes, has again escaped unscathed from a heist. The hallmark of all his crimes are playing cards bearing the message ‘Hocus Pocus, can you find Hocus?’ He is known to be a dangerous man with a wicked sense of humour. In your search for this wanted magician, you and your team have stumbled into his mysterious Chamber of Hocus in hopes of capturing him once and for all…
